programme.desc: Flashbacks reveal the murder case that first introduced young Gibbs to NCIS and to Ducky.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The discovery of two dead bodies in a forest leads the NCIS team into the wild world of modern-day treasure hunting; Gibbs and Fornell get deeper into their search for the opioid kingpin.

programme.title: Law and Order Toronto: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: When a beloved art professor, Eve Kinwood, is killed, the team must use her art to find the "Real Eve" and her killer.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Politician Alex Munez and his bodyguard Eddie become embroiled in a high-profile sex scandal - and hope their childhood friend Barba can help get them out of it.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 4-year-old student makes claims of sexual abuse against a singing coach and popular TV personality (Billy Porter).

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A popular sports reporter seeks out Detective Benson to accuse a cameraman of rape and stalking. The team begin their preparations for the trial when the victim learns shes pregnant as result of the rape.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a school nurse notices several injuries on a young girl, the team investigates. A look at the family reveals a mother struggling to manage the violent outbursts of her nine year old son. As the SVU squad and the visiting Doctor debate an appropriate course of treatment, the situation rapidly explodes into a dangerous standoff.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A runaway bride calls the SVU for help on the day of her wedding; Rollins pitches in on her day off.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Agent Sykes struggles to cope on the anniversary of her sisters disappearance; Benson suspects a cold case from Manhattan could help her get closure.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: There isnt a great deal of Christmas spirit in the Meldrew household. Victor at first refuses to be in the local pantomime, or buy presents - then 263 garden gnomes are delivered by mistake. However, things begin to look up when a bottle of wine is delivered.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: For the last time in this festive series, Ben Fogle and Kate Humble are at Longleat Safari Park to conclude a magical week of programmes. Today, Ben and Kate are set a secret mission to find out which animals should go on the naughty list and who should go on the nice list, but with animals including ferocious tigers, enormous rhinos and naughty monkeys, how can they possibly decide? And what will be in store for the animals on Christmas morning?

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion goes to see a two-bed terrace in Rugby and a two-bed ground floor flat in Doncaster, while Martin is in Tylorstown in south Wales to look at a three-bed mid-terrace with breathtaking views.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: In a special festive show, Charlie Ross discovers the story behind Christmas stamps, which first appeared on cards and letters in the UK in 1966. Charlie meets Chris Taft from the Postal Museum and shows off a unique Bargain Hunt stamp design! At the antiques fair in Malvern, the red and blue teams are ready for some first-class Christmas shopping.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin takes in the delights of Derbyshire with a couple from Leeds, who, with their fantastic budget, want to see a range of rural properties with all the trimmings. Jonnie takes time out to visit a repair cafe where, over a coffee and slice of cake, environmentally minded customers can take household items to be mended instead of thrown away.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.desc: First through the doors of is farmer Phillip from Cheshire with his son Thomas. Thomas has got an industrial-sized butter churn up for grabs, and dad Phillip has come along to school the dealers in the art of butter making. Next in and local to Edinburgh HQ is Tanya and her entourage of chihuahua dogs. Third to arrive in the room is Niall with a linen tram blind from Glasgows famous Botanic Gardens.

programme.title: Pointless Celebrities

programme.desc: Joe Pasquale, Luxmy Gopal, Zoe Alcroft, Charlie Brooks and Rav Wilding race in moving podiums in a festive episode of the quiz to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Eric Knowles is joined by none other than Father Christmas to present a fabulously festive Bargain Hunt. Hopefully unwrapping lots of profits are two teams of Christmas shoppers, and gifting their knowledge are experts Raj Bisram and Izzie Balmer.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A first-time buyer has decided to leave the home she grew up in on the outskirts of Birmingham for a new one in the nearby Shropshire countryside. Nicki Chapman shows her what this stunning county has to offer, and helps out by pulling pints for the locals at a community-owned pub.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Pugin Tiles, Medicine Ball, Duke of York Stone
programme.desc: A collection of encaustic tiles leaves Jo and JB speechless, Glen hopes to find a fortune with his metal detector, and swimming teacher Lynne treats the dealers to a workout.

programme.title: Pointless Celebrities
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and co-host Richard Osman present a special celebrity edition of the general knowledge quiz in which four teams try to come up with the answers that no-one else could think of. programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Walford reacts to the aftermath of a fire, Kat attempts to make the best of Christmas by putting plans in place, and Anthony raises concerns.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Its festive season at The Repair Shop, and this year the team of experts are back spreading joy and creating more Christmas magic with their festive fixes. First through the barn doors are two giant fibre-glass puffins that were gifted to a very special childrens bookshop. The puffins have welcomed generations of children and been at the centre of the bookshops Christmas celebrations for over 50 years.

programme.title: A Mary Berry Christmas
programme.desc: Dame Mary Berry celebrates the magic of the seasons traditions. Along with her special guests - legendary actor Alison Steadman, Commonwealth sprinter and star of Gladiators Harry Aikines-Aryeetey and much-loved broadcaster and presenter Zoe Ball. And central to it all are Marys exceptional recipes, including pigs in blankets cassoulet, roast king mushrooms with chestnut stuffing, a magnificent cherry and lemon mille-feuille and a show-stopping grand finale of pear and ginger steamed pudding.

Anita discovers his life-affirming Christmas story, from contracting polio as a toddler in Nigeria, to growing up with a disability in east London in the 1970s, to the rocky road that led to Paralympic glory with the British wheelchair basketball team. While their unique lifestyle has brought fame, the rest of Japans snow monkeys lead very different lives.

programme.desc: The squirrels go for a woodland walk to help Duggee look for a very special leaf when they hear the strangest noise. In the distance, they can see a funny shape. What is that noise? What is that shape? Maybe its a monster? No, wait! Its only Hedgley the Hedgehog, who has been trundling around the forest collecting all sorts of leaves and twigs on his spiky quills, which make him look and sound like a leafy monster.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on the planet Pisolino, a soft, pastel-coloured celestial body. The team is greeted by three alien children in the shape of an alarm clock, who tell about their favourite game.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Timmys imagination is sparked when he reads a superhero comic. He becomes desperate to save the day, but his efforts arent always appreciated.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: Ted has big plans for his sister Sophias birthday. He organises a family tea party and begins by making delicious cupcakes. He also plans a scavenger hunt in the garden as a surprise.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Febos family are from America, where they celebrate Thanksgiving. As it is traditional on Thanksgiving to prepare and serve pumpkin pie as a dessert, Febo is making this for friends. He starts by making a pastry case and fitting it in a pie dish.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Rory and Sandy are searching for lizards while Chantelle discovers what they eat. Find out how lizards help the eco-system and try a Teeny Tiny Task, lizard camouflage art.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: The school is having a very special lantern parade, so each child gets to make their very own lantern with their face on. Oliver and Felicity are making theirs with help from Mrs Collins. They use a milk bottle for the body, pipe cleaners for arms and coloured paper for clothes, then they add a photo of their face. Once the lanterns have been made, the children hang them on a wire in the playground ready for the parade.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Grace, get her hands on two-wheeled machines as she looks at three amazing motorbikes. First, she tests her balance skills on a trail bike and shows off a mini motocross bike, and then she test drives an amazing sidecar motocross bike.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `snow, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of snow - cold snow, falling snow, twinkly snow and yummy snow. Theres sparkly snow and sledging snow, and Dee and Penguin have fun throwing snow!

programme.title: Numberblocks

programme.title: Wonderblocks

programme.title: Spin City

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Marie and Frank devastate Ray by trading in their gift, a personally engraved toaster, for a coffeemaker.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray challenges his father to a game of table tennis after learning that the elder Barone purposely let him win.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: When Marie finds out that Ray held a party in her house 20 years ago, she spurns him in favour of Robert.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Robert are roped in to make a film to celebrate Frank being elected Man of the Year at his lodge, but are shocked to discover none of his lodge friends likes him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers romantic marriage proposal is ruined when Monicas former boyfriend returns, Joey accidentally buys a boat, and a dormitory incident reminds Ross how young his girlfriend is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica is left reeling from Richards declaration that he loves her and wants to marry her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is toasting Chandler and Monicas engagement, but after Chandler fails to come up with the goods in the bedroom, he begins to worry about the consequences. Elsewhere, Monica thinks Rachel is trying to steal her glory when she catches her kissing Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monicas dream of a fairytale wedding fizzles out after she learns what her parents have done with her wedding fund. Meanwhile, Rachel fumes when a teasing Joey stumbles across her juicy late-night reading material.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers desperate effort to bond with Monicas dad by playing racquetball backfires when he accidentally gets too up-close-and-personal. Elsewhere, Rachel tries to teach `landlubber Joey how to sail without falling overboard, while Monica seeks to replicate Phoebes late grandmothers secret recipe by deconstructing her last remaining cookie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel must hire an assistant and agonises over whether to hire an efficient, experienced woman, or sexy young Tag Jones. Ignoring her friends advice, she hires Tag and soon regrets it. To make matters worse, Tag is attracted to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Engagement Picture
programme.desc: While taking an engagement picture for himself and Monica, Chandler cant stop pulling a strange face, Rachel enlists Joey to take Tag out for a night on the town, and Phoebe and Ross date a couple in the middle of a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Nap Partners
programme.desc: Wedding fever continues when Monica cant decide whether to appoint Rachel or Phoebe as her maid of honour. To help Monica decide, Joey and Ross test them on how they would react in certain wedding situations.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Library Book
programme.desc: Ross is elated that the university library contains his doctoral dissertation, but he is shocked to discover that it is located in a remote corner frequently used by students having sex. Elsewhere, the tables are turned on Joey when Erin is the one to just want sex and not a relationship.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Doesnt Like Dogs
programme.desc: Joey may have ruined Rachels chances with Tag when he opens his mouth during Thanksgiving dinner, and Phoebe reveals that she has been secretly keeping a cute dog in her room for a few days while its owner is away.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Candy
programme.desc: Rachel is dating her assistant, Tag, but they must keep it a secret at work because of the companys anti-dating policy. Her friends warn her that the relationship will only cause her trouble, but just for fun, she becomes more brazen about it.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Ross unexpectedly finds himself looking after Ben and decides to do something special for Christmas. Since all the Santa costumes have been rented out, Ross dons the best outfit left and entertains Ben as the holiday armadillo.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Cheesecakes
programme.desc: Chandler and Rachel pig out on a neighbours cheesecake that was mistakenly delivered to Chandler. They feel bad, but not quite guilty enough to refrain from eating a second one that has also been wrongly delivered.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Theyre Up All Night
programme.desc: During their fist night together, Rachel and Tag realise they forgot to ship out an important package at the office.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes new job as a telemarketer gets off to a tricky start when the first person she calls, an office worker called Earl, tells her he feels unappreciated and wants to kill himself. Phoebe keeps him on the telephone, trying to persuade him otherwise and finally takes the desperate measure of going to his office to convince him to stay alive.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where They All Turn Thirty
programme.desc: Celebrating Rachels 30th birthday inspires the friends to reminisce about their own 30th birthdays. Joey got angry with God for breaking their deal, Ross bought himself a sports car in an attempt to recapture his youth, and Monica got blind drunk and embarrassed herself at her surprise party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Albert is neither the most attractive nor the most confident man in the world, so when he falls in love with one of his firms clients, Allegra Cole, he calls in an expert to help him win her over. Hitch is the business name of Alex Hitchins, and he earns his pay by teaching men how to woo the girl of their choice.

programme.desc: As the fleet faces closure of the fishery, Sig lures legendary captain, Johnathan Hillstrand, out of retirement. Firing up his legendary vessel, F/V Time Bandit, the old pirate assembles a veteran crew to return to the Bering Sea.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: A Kid for Two Farthings
programme.desc: Set in Petticoat Lane, this film focuses on young Joe who lives with his mother Joanna above a tailor shop owned by Kandinsky. The tailor explains to Joe, through the legend of the unicorn, that everyones dreams and wishes can come true. The young boy determines to help realise all the wishes of his hard-working neighbours.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: A cowboy falsely accused of murdering his ex-fiancees lover is given a last-minute reprieve by a lynch mob in order to prove his innocence and find the real killer.

programme.title: Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Two soldiers whose bid to escape from the American Civil War takes them involuntarily to a South Seas island. Here, accompanied by three other renegades, they encounter two beautiful English ladies whove been shipwrecked and a host of less-than-beautiful monsters.

programme.desc: A tired-looking and dilapidated old rocking horse arrives at the barn, requiring the joint attention of furniture restorer Will Kirk and saddlery expert Suzie Fletcher. Meanwhile, horologist Steve Fletcher attempts to revive a century-old Barograph.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: In Altrincham in Greater Manchester, Jay Blades is scouring the recycling centre in search of three unwanted items he can save and sell on. Furniture restyler Chloe Kempster attempts to give an old tallboy a new lease of life while woodworker Bruce Faulseit has an interesting challenge on his hands with a collection of slate tiles.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: A man who became famous as The Ice Baby, after being found in a London phone box on the coldest night of the year, searches for answers, while touching revelations are in store for another man who was discovered inside public toilets in Abergavenny in 1958. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.sub-title: A Pink Poodle And A Potato Picker
programme.desc: Angus visits a home packed with weird and wonderful collectibles. He is also called back to a previous client to clear an attic and garden.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts Raj Bisram and Irita Marriott put their foot down, cruising into Oxfordshire on the third leg of their east-to-west odyssey. Raj finds the ideal item that no self-respecting gardener should be without, or so he thinks.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Travelling antiques aficionados Irita Marriott and Raj Bisram make their mark in Devon on this leg of the trip. Topics under discussion in the MG Midget today include the huge number of roads in the county and the correct way to prepare a scone.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus heads to Wetherby to meet John and Anne. After a recent tumble from a tree injured his arm, John decided to clear-out his quirky collection of antiques.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Over the past seven years, Long Lost Family has reunited over 200 people with their long lost relatives. But for both our searchers and their new family members, meeting is just the beginning. We revisit three more families who were separated by extraordinary circumstances. Divorced couple Marion Williams and James McDonnell united in their search to find the son they gave up for adoption as teenagers.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Catching up with three women whose lives have been changed in ways they never expected. Deborah Ozturk was reunited with her biological mother, Mary Davies was the first ever deaf contributor, and Vicki Haskell finally met her blood relatives.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: A mother and daughter bring in a stuffed tortoise that has been in the family for 44 years. Plus, a woman brings in a chair that belonged to her mother.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: The team has been called in to investigate the Trinity Arts Centre, a music and theatre in a monumental church built in 1843, where it seems to be haunted.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: The team investigates a terraced house in the former mining village of Ynyshir in the Rhondda Valley, South Wales. They try to identify and calm a threatening presence.

programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee the Autobot finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. When 17-year-old Charlie revives him, she quickly learns that this is no ordinary yellow Volkswagen.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus travels the underworld to defeat the evil god Hades, who seeks to overthrow Zeus and bring hell to Earth.

programme.title: Wrath of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus enlists the aid of Queen Andromeda, Hephaestus and Poseidons son to rescue Zeus from the underworld, defeat the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.desc: Young and naive forest spirit Mavka, develops feelings for a human musician, Lukas. As they grow closer to each other, an inevitable situation forces Mavka to choose between her love and her duty as a guardian of the forest.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! The Sword and the Scoob
programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the gang back to the age chivalrous knights, spell-casting wizards, and fire-breathing dragons.

programme.desc: Canine rocker Bodi and his band discover the price of fame when they go on tour with pop sensation Lil Foxy.

programme.title: Rock Dog 3: Battle the Beat
programme.desc: Hoping to inspire a new generation of rock stars, Bodi joins a musical competition show and becomes an overnight TV personality sensation.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: When his wickedness is challenged, super-villain Gru hatches a plan to steal the Moon. Enlisting three young orphans to help out, his dastardly plot is derailed when he begins to care for them.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: When an evil alien attacks the Earth, a motley crew of monsters is called into action to save the world from imminent destruction. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Briar and Bramble lose their mother at a very young age under mysterious circumstances. Many years later, logger Vick takes the bears to visit the Robot Research Institute, and they uncover a clue relating to their mother.

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.desc: Young and naive forest spirit Mavka, develops feelings for a human musician, Lukas. As they grow closer to each other, an inevitable situation forces Mavka to choose between her love and her duty as a guardian of the forest.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! The Sword and the Scoob
programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the gang back to the age chivalrous knights, spell-casting wizards, and fire-breathing dragons.

programme.title: Rock Dog 2: Rock Around the Park
programme.desc: Canine rocker Bodi and his band discover the price of fame when they go on tour with pop sensation Lil Foxy.

programme.title: Rock Dog 3: Battle the Beat
programme.desc: Hoping to inspire a new generation of rock stars, Bodi joins a musical competition show and becomes an overnight TV personality sensation.

programme.desc: When his wickedness is challenged, super-villain Gru hatches a plan to steal the Moon. Enlisting three young orphans to help out, his dastardly plot is derailed when he begins to care for them.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: When an evil alien attacks the Earth, a motley crew of monsters is called into action to save the world from imminent destruction. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! The Sword and the Scoob
programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the gang back to the age chivalrous knights, spell-casting wizards, and fire-breathing dragons.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her M?ori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save Sonnys mom and foil Slappys wicked plan.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five school kids - an athlete, a spoiled rich kid, a brainy nerd, an introverted loner and a rebellious punk - are brought together on a day-long detention where they break the rules, bare their souls and find they have more in common than just attending the same high school.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyones imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five school kids - an athlete, a spoiled rich kid, a brainy nerd, an introverted loner and a rebellious punk - are brought together on a day-long detention where they break the rules, bare their souls and find they have more in common than just attending the same high school.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Coach Ken Carter, a controversial high school basketball coach who received national attention when he benched his undefeated team due to their collective poor academic record in 1999. In the face of much criticism, Carter fought to keep his methods, determined to show the boys that they need to rely on more than sports for their futures.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: The Kings Speech
programme.desc: Afflicted with a stammer, Prince Albert, the Duke of York, dreads the speaking engagements that come with being the son of King George V.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.title: May December
programme.desc: Twenty years after their notorious tabloid romance, a married couple buckle under the pressure when a Hollywood actress meets them to do research for a film about their past.

programme.title: A Mistake
programme.desc: A surgeon allows her young colleague to take charge during a surgery. When a mistake occurs, the surgeon finds herself in a difficult situation.

programme.title: Sharp Corner
programme.desc: A dedicated family man becomes obsessed with saving the lives of the car accident victims on the sharp corner in front of his house - an obsession that could cost him everything.

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: Violet is a widowed mother who goes to a restaurant to meet Henry, her charming and handsome date. However, she soon receives phone messages from a mysterious, hooded figure who threatens to kill her young son and sister unless she kills Henry.

programme.title: Promising Young Woman
programme.desc: Nothing in Cassies life is what it appears to be, shes wickedly smart, tantalisingly cunning, and shes living a secret double life by night. Now, an unexpected encounter is about to give Cassie a chance to right the wrongs from the past.

programme.title: Until Dawn

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite to fulfil their grandmothers last wish as they travel to the French Alps for Christmas, bonding and finding love along the way. (2025, 95 mins)

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: The Crazies

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.desc: Santa Clauss wish comes true when he accidentally bumps his head and starts believing hes SuperKlaus. With the help of Billie and Leo his elf-xecutive assistant, SuperKlaus will take on a toy-obsessed businessman to save Christmas.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO tries to close her hard-partying brothers branch, he and his chief technical officer must inspire their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and save their jobs.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders unravels a web of small-town lies while investigating the bizarre murders of two women with the same name. He meets and quickly falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour whos eager to help solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-mans-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoners psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders unravels a web of small-town lies while investigating the bizarre murders of two women with the same name. He meets and quickly falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour whos eager to help solve the mystery.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. Using his codename Condor, he contacts the CIA, but when an agent tries to kill him, he kidnaps a stranger off the street to ensure his survival and attempts to turn the tables on those who want him dead.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A mild mannered, socially weird government accountant moonlights as a highly trained, and deadly assassin.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A driven young man named Lou stumbles upon the underground world of Los Angeles freelance crime journalism.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Harlem drug dealer Frank Lucas rises to power in corrupt 1970s New York, equalling and surpassing the notorious Mafia families with the reach of his empire. On the other side of the law, honest cop Richie Roberts dedicates himself to taking down `the most dangerous man walking the streets. Lucas acts with impunity, smuggling heroin into the US in the coffins of American soldiers killed in Vietnam.

programme.desc: Jack teaches Grace how to cope with her domineering mother by being a `good gay son, and Wills new job brings him into conflict with a slum landlord: Karen Walker.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild
programme.desc: Cabo Pulmo, a tiny ocean community on the shores of Mexicos Sea of Cortez, is home to an extraordinary story of marine recovery. By the mid-1980s, this near-pristine coral reef was all but wiped out - decimated by reckless overfishing. That is, until those same fishermen abandoned their way of life and fought to save what Jacques Cousteau once called the aquarium of the world.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Baby woolly monkey Paulo meets his new family for the first time, young chimpanzee Eddi has fun and games with baby brother Bart, pregnant orang-utan Amy gets to grips with a breast pump, and emotions run high when Mad Max the marmoset arrives at the park to be with others of his own kind.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Mad Max meets his new housemates, and chimps Ben and Pip are in shock after another meeting with Hananya. Over in the woolly monkey enclosure, Piquita is the centre of attention and, in Paddys chimp group, Bart enjoys his first taste of honey.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: North of the worlds largest freshwater lake lies some of the worlds fiercest terrain: from the rugged ancient landscape of the Canadian Shield and northern forests to stunning vistas of Lake Superior.

programme.desc: Large rodents called capybaras that live on the northern edge of the Brazilian Pantanal are spotlighted.

programme.title: Africas Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: On South Africas west coast, cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that cant swim, it is challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild
programme.desc: Palau is a tiny country with a big story. In 2009, this island nation in the middle of the western Pacific Ocean created the worlds first shark sanctuary to protect more than 100 shark species from reckless overfishing and the brutal practice of commercial shark finning. Then, in 2014, Palau once again led the way. It established the worlds largest marine sanctuary - a no-go zone for foreign commercial fisheries nearly the size of California.

programme.desc: Bart pretends to be an available millionaire when he answers his teachers personal ad.

programme.desc: When Jim returns from jury duty Dwight questions him about the case; Angela and the senator welcome their new baby.

programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges hes overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: The Good Life

programme.desc: Its been ten years since we last went to Billericay to spend Christmas with the Shipmans and the Wests.This year were off to Wales for the festivities, where Bryns cooking dinner for over thirteen people.

programme.desc: Lees plan to spend time alone with Lucy at Christmas is threatened by the presence of Tim, Daisy, Tim and Lucys parents, and even Barbara, doing the cooking. All seems to be going well until a murder mystery game brings family tensions to a head.

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: It is Christmas Day in the Royle household and Barbara is up to her eyes in it, as Jim is out of action following an unfortunate incident in the precinct while Dave and Denise are feeling the affects of the recession the most, and worry that Anthonys lavish gifts will eclipse their gift of a fridge magnet.
